name: Barboach
description: The Whiskers Pokémon. Barboach's sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This Pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters the battle, an opponent must reveal if it has a move that the Pokémon is vulnerable to. The move itself does not have to be revealed, only that there is such a move.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by negative status ailments in water or during rainy conditions.
